# styra_policy (Data Source)

Policy DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "styra_policy" "my_policy" {
  dependencies = false
  policy       = "...my_policy..."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `policy` (String) policy name

### Optional

- `dependencies` (Boolean) include dependencies

### Read-Only

- `request_id` (String)
- `result` (String) Parsed as JSON.
